response.overview: Gritty Romance is a heartfelt, laugh-out-loud romantic comedy with a powerful spiritual core. Gwen “Gritty” Ritty is exhausted by dating apps, failed connections, and the pressure to find love in all the wrong places. When she discovers an 8-step challenge created by renowned Christian author Magnolia Simmons, Gritty reluctantly embarks on a journey that pushes her far outside her comfort zone. Each step leads to unexpected, awkward, and hilarious situations that slowly reshape her view of love, identity, and faith.  With a dynamic ensemble cast and sharp comedic timing, the film blends modern dating culture with timeless biblical truth. More than a love story, Gritty Romance is about self-discovery, surrender, and learning to seek God first—trusting that everything else will follow. Compact yet complete, the film delivers a full cinematic experience packed with humor, heart, and hope, making it perfect for faith-based audiences and anyone searching for meaning beyond the swipe.
response.tagline: A gritty-yet-faith-filled romantic comedy with heart, humor, and purpose.
response.title: Gritty Romance
